Title: House of Marley Men's Billet Leather Watch (WM-FA005-IO)
Description: Get a stylish watch that makes a statement with the House of Marley Men's Billet Leather Watch. This stylish men's watch features a stainless steel case, white dial, and black leather strap, giving you a look that's perfect for the office or a lazy weekend. The watch features quartz movement, for accurate and reliable time, and includes a built-in date feature which shows day of the week, date, and month. The round watch case measures 42mm in diameter and includes a mineral crystal display for durability. The watch is also water resistant up to 50 m.
